message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to let it go for $18,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go.  I'm happy to pay $15,000 for this product.  Let me know if that works for you.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $17,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down a bit, but $17,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking to my offer of $15,000.  This is the best I can do.
